name: createApproveAndDeclineICRCJobRequisition

testSteps.description: When the Line Manager creates a Job requisition (A_1_1)

children.description: Given that I'm logged in to HR space as 'Christoph Sutter'
Given that I'm logged in to HR space using 'A345318' account
When i set the module to organisation info
When I set the header module to 'Organisation Info'
When i click the position org chart tab
Then the position org chart should show up
When I set the Org chart position ID to '845440'
When i click an available position
Then the position pop up should show up
When i click on create job requisition menu
Then the manage job requisition pop up should show up
When I set the Job Requisition Template to 'ICRC Requisition'
When i click on portlet create button
Then the selected position node should show up
When i expand the selected position
Then the position pop up should show up
When i expand the portlet job requisition details section

testSteps.description: When the Line Manager edits and reviews the ICRC Job Requisition Details fields (A_1_4)

children.description: Given that I'm logged in to HR space as 'Christoph Sutter'
Given that I'm logged in to HR space using 'A345318' account
When i set the module to recruiting
When I set the header module to 'Recruiting'
Then the job requisition page and its contents to show up
When i click on filter options button
When i set the requisition ID filter using the saved value
When i click on update screen button
When i set the job requisition filter to all job requisitions
When i click the requested job position from job requisitions table
Then the job requisition details page should show up
Then the route map section and its contents should show up
Then the route map should show current status: Job Requisition Creation
When i open internal posting preview and save the job title
Then the internal preview job title is same as internal position title field
When i open external posting preview and get the job title
Then the external preview job title is same as external position title field
Then the required fields in pre approved ICRC job requisition details for LM should be correctly displayed
Then the required fields in Job Requisition Details should be correctly displayed
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Requisition ID' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Requisition status' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Default language' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Languages for job advertisement' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Position code' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Position title (Internal)' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Positions title (External)' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Job code' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Job role' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Job level' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Cost center' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Budgetted FTE' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Standard weekly hours of the position - Full time' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'New / Existing position' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Wished assignment start date' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Duration (months)' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Hardship' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Number of vacancies' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Language 1' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Language 2' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Language 3' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Context requirements' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Questions' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Interview Attachments' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Line Manager' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'HR Manager' field as required field is '0'
Then having the Job Requisition Details 'Comments' field as required field is '0'
Then the buttons in pre approved job requisition details for LM should be correctly displayed
Then the buttons for job requisition details form should be correctly displayed: <null>, true, true, <null>, <null>, <null>, true, true, <null>, <null>, <null>, true, <null>, <null>, <null>
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Save changes' button should not be present
The the Job Requisition Details 'Save and Close' button should be clickable - 'true'
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Send to Previous Step' button should not be present
The the Job Requisition Details 'Send to Next Step' button should be clickable - 'true'
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Approve' button should not be present
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Revision complete' button should not be present
The the Job Requisition Details 'Cancel Job Requisition' button should be clickable - 'true'
The the Job Requisition Details 'Close without saving' button should be clickable - 'true'
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Close Job Requisition' button should not be present
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Re-Open' button should not be present
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Job Requisition Approved' button should not be present
The the Job Requisition Details 'Delete' button should be clickable - 'true'
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Save Information' button should not be present
Then the Job Requisition Details 'Closing not saving information' button should not be present
Then the Job Requisition Details 'End job requisition' button should not be present
When I set the New/Existing Position to 'Existing position'
When I set the Wished assignment start date to '30/11/2021'
When I set the Duration (months) to '24'
When I set the Hardship to 'H0'
When I set the Language 1 to 'English'
When I set the Language 2 to 'French'
When I set the Language 3 to 'Filipino'
When I set Context requirements to 'test'
When i set nationailities restriction: test
When I set Comments to 'Test'
When I click on Save and Close button

testSteps.description: When the Line Manager sends the Job Requisition for approval (A_1_10)
